name: Potatoes Quest
description:
Potatoes Quest is a puzzle game with mechanics inspired by Quantum Physics. You will go room after room trying to gather enough energy resources to have enough power to give conciousness to a computer, which will be your Mega Final Boss.

Controls:
- WASD or Arrows to move
- SPACE to interact with objects
- Q to use switch from Particle to Wave form (and back)
- R to restart the level
- M to go back to the main menu

Live a touching experience with Dr. Grandpa, exiled from the world for the danger of his discoveries

Warnings:
- The final level is a bit buggy. I wish I had more time to spend on it, but that wasn't the case. Sometimes it might not detect a win or stuff like that. In that case you can press R to restart the level. Also, your opponend will play "randomly". It would be cool to have some kind of algorithm that makes it play better, but that would have meant a lot more time needed.
